function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Use of autonomous robots in the interconnected iomt infrastructure may lead to bias and breach of privacy in collecting samples from infected patients.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous network protocols and smart applications in remote consultation could lead to privacy and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear who regulations and policies on the use of autonomous and unmanned iomt concepts in fighting covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sharing of covid-19 data may breach privacy and security of the individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of privacy as infection status is shown to all","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis of covid-19 patients lack of quality test","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to spatial covid-19 data for spatial mapping and visualization","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability problems with remote consultations and diagnosis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Privacy concerns with contact-tracing apps","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regional integration of electronic health records of suspected covid-19 individuals as they travel from one country to the other","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tracking of home-quarantined individuals using gps and mobile phones","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Malicious attack of iomt healthcare equipment","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of personal identification with safety systems could breach privacy and security of health systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote collection of covid-19 pandemic data using blockchain records could pose privacy risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of implementing blockchain technology in health systems could lead to security vulnerabilities.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 misinformation causing fear and panic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatization and anxiety related to covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Generation of noisy data for covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to detect asymptomatic covid-19 cases in ct images","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent international regulations for covid-19 chest ct image data sharing","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor data quality and sharing in covid-19 chest ct image analysis","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical issues and technology vulnerability","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overlapping in the identification of covid-19 cases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Requirement for change of regulations to track contact-person","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical framework and acceptable use of emerging technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in contact tracing process, including identification, privacy violation, and monitoring.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased exposure of contact tracing personnel to covid-19 and potential stigmatization.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Analysis of people’s migration patterns leading to privacy concerns and ethical implications","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misuse of contact tracing data for unethical purposes","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate and unreliable ai forecasting models due to noisy and limited data","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Search string focusing on contagious diseases could lead to biased results and miss important studies related to other diseases or areas of research.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exclusion of nonpeer-reviewed articles and studies in other languages with no english translation might lead to language and publication bias.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on ai algorithms for quality assessment may overlook important nuances and context in the evaluation of research articles.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-risk patients identification","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 hotspot mapping","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate real-time case surveillance","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited information on how covid-19 spreads in asymptomatic individuals","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in reliable information on covid-19 transmission between countries","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Impact of stay-at-home on physical and mental health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Demographic breakdown of study participants","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health impacts of lack of access to exercise and physical activity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Over-reporting bias of physical activity in the study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Correlation between physical activity and psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction of physical activity levels linked to worse psychological well-being","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased physical activity energy expenditure during quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels during the pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Gender differences in exercise habits","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low physical activity levels among italian adults, especially during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
